Mahmoud Sehili (27 Julaị 1931 - 10 Ọktoba 2015) bụ onye Tunisia na-ese ihe.
A mụrụ Sehili na Tunis; nna ya bụ onye ọkụ azụ ebe nne ya bụ onye na-achọ mma
Ọ zụlitere mmasị maka egwu ma mụta oud
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Tunis Institute of Fine Arts site na 1949 ruo 1952, ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ ya na École nationale supérieure des Beaux-Arts site na 1953 ruo 1960
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Tunisia, ọ kwadoro ogbako ma nye nkuzi na School of Fine Arts nke Tunis site na 1960 ruo 1980.
